item.description:
*This event is hosted by Steve*

Afterwork Mixer for young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Waterfront.

The Afterwork Mixer returns this Thursday June 13th 5:30-9pm. This time we are taking the party to Tia's , one of the city's afterwork hotspots. The rain forcasted for Thurs will be gone by early afternoon so come and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend!

Meeting Details: We will meet near the entrance. This place is packed on Thurs nites so I highly ENCOURAGE you to attend early as possible. My picture is on the site so I should not be hard to find. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving.

See you there!

For all interested afterwards we will head to District Lounge a new venue by the owners of 33 for an open bar reception.

Steven

Public Transportation

Green Line to Governement Center
Blue Line to Government Center/Aquarium.

For more information, see http://boston.citysea...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Summer is finally here! Afterwork Mixer at TIA'S
